h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Bronze Buddha Pendant Location
content: The Bronze Buddha Pendant can be found randomly from the Wolf Guardians in The New West. Simply farm them around Longevity Road until the item drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bronze_Buddha_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Bronze Buddha Pendant', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Bronze Buddha Pendant Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Bronze Buddha Pendant can be found randomly from the Wolf Guardians in The New West. Simply farm them around Longevity Road until the item drops.
